name: FirstPersonS
description:
Early Access

This game is still early in development.
Several features - including player movement and a weapon shouting mechanic - have not yet been finalized.
It is still very much a sandbox, with no end goals or quests for the player to complete.

This version is only for testing.
but a demo is in development
